title: Render Gallery
description: Artwork submitted by dozens of users, created using our assets.

submit.title: Submit Your Render
submit.description: Have you created some awesome artwork using one of our assets? Show it off on this site!
submit.err-size: Your image is too big, must be under 1MB
submit.err-asset-limit: You can't select more than {{limit}} assets, please choose only the most prominent ones visible in your render.
submit.s1p1: Have you created some <lnk>awesome artwork</lnk> using one of our assets? Show it off on this site!
submit.s1p2: After you submit your render it'll be sent to us for approval. If we like it, it'll show in the gallery for a few weeks, and also on the pages of the assets you used to create it.
submit.s1p3: If we like your render a lot, we'll feature it permanently and share it on our social media.
submit.s2p1: The artwork must be your own creation, and you must be allowed to display it publically.
submit.s2p2: You must have used at least one of Poly Haven's HDRIs/textures/models in the creation of your artwork.
submit.s2p3: Nudity or other NSFW content cannot be accepted.
submit.s3p1: We get a lot of submissions, so unfortunately we can only accept the highest quality artwork to prevent the gallery from becoming cluttered.
submit.s3p2: We're not trying to be another ArtStation, this gallery is dedicated to showing off what you can do with Poly Haven's assets.
submit.s3p3: If you would like to ask for feedback on your render before submitting it, we have a very helpful community on <lnk>Discord</lnk>.
submit.s3p4: We'll notify you by email if your render is accepted or rejected. This may take a day or two as we tend to review submissions in bulk.
submit.s3p5: Here are some common reasons for rejection:
submit.s3p5l4: Very similar render from another artist already present (e.g. "car on backplate" type renders with the same backplate).
submit.s3p5l5: Too many submissions - typically we accept at most 3 different images per artist per month.
submit.s3p5l6: Multiple renders of the same project (different camera angles or lighting setups) - only submit your best render for each project, and then link to your ArtStation page where people can find more.

form.your-name-d: As you want to be credited.
form.your-email-d: Used only to notify you when your artwork is published. Stored securely and not shared with anyone.
form.link-d: Your website/portfolio, or a link to more renders of this project.
form.software-d: Which 3D software did you use to create your artwork?
form.assets-d: Which HDRIs, textures or 3D models from Poly Haven did you use?
form.thanks-d: We'll review your render within a few days and email you the results.
